title: No Alert Required
description: No weather alert conditions detected. All values within normal range.

title: High Wind Warning
description: Strong winds have been detected. Please secure outdoor objects and stay indoors.

title: Heavy Rain Alert
description: Significant precipitation is expected. Please take necessary precautions.

title: Storm Alert
description: Storm conditions detected. Strong winds and heavy precipitation. Stay indoors and avoid travel.

title: Coastal Warning
description: Dangerous weather conditions for coastal areas. Strong winds and significant waves expected.
